entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character of the story, introduced as one of the three friends entering the Great Hall for breakfast.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is another friend of Harry's, who enters the Great Hall with him and Hermione.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is a friend of Harry's and Ron's, who advises them to ignore Malfoy.

entities.name: draco malfoy
entities.description: Malfoy is a Slytherin student who is entertaining his friends with a funny story.

entities.name: pansy parkinson
entities.description: Pansy Parkinson is a Slytherin girl who shrieks at Harry and warns him about the dementors.

entities.name: george weasley
entities.description: George Weasley is Ron's brother, who sits next to Harry at the Gryffindor table.

relationships.description: Harry and Malfoy interact with each other in the Great Hall, with Malfoy pretending to faint with terror.
Ron glares at Malfoy from across the table, indicating his dislike for him.
George Weasley calls Malfoy a 'little git', showing his disdain for him.
Pansy Parkinson shrieks at Harry and warns him about the dementors, causing an interaction between them.
